TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to Gilbert, xx-xx-1827

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with Preston Gilbert, December —, 1827.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1732

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account with Preston Gilbert, December —, 1827.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Preston Gilbert Dr*/person_mentioned*—•*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1827">1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*To hauling 5 loads of lumber *location_mentioned*from the San Bernard to San Felipe*/location_mentioned* at $16.00 per load-------$80.00*/p*
*p*Cr. by——------27.94*/p*
*p*To Balance Due----52.06*/p*
*p*settled in a/c with *person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="03-01-1832">1st March 1832*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Preston Gilbert*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
